DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the trial is to investigate the relative bioavailability, influence of pantoprazole coadministration and food effect of different oral formulations of BI 113608 in healthy male subjects
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Relative Bioavailability, Influence of Pantoprazole Coadministration and Food Effect of Different Oral Formulation of BI 113608
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
